title: Yunnan Pu-erh
description: Aged fermented tea with earthy, smooth taste that improves with time.
longDescription: Yunnan Pu-erh is a fermented tea known for its unique aging process and complex flavor profile. The leaves are harvested from ancient tea trees in the Yunnan province and undergo a natural fermentation process that can last for years. The infusion is dark amber in color with an earthy aroma and a rich, smooth flavor that develops over time. The taste is often described as woody, musty, and slightly sweet, with a lingering finish.
brewingInstructions: Use water at 200°F (93°C). Steep for 3-5 minutes. Can be infused multiple times.

reviews.author: Pu-erh Lover
reviews.comment: This Yunnan Pu-erh is fantastic! The earthy flavor and smooth finish are exactly what I look for in a good pu-erh.

reviews.author: Tea Connoisseur
reviews.comment: A great pu-erh with a rich, complex flavor. The aging process really shines through in this tea.
